Package cosc202.andie

package cosc202.andie
  • Class
    Description
    Andie
    Main class for A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).
    BrightnessFilter
    ImageOperation to adjust the brightness of an image
    ColourActions
    Actions provided by the Colour menu.
    ContrastFilter
    A class that implements the ImageOperation interface to adjust the contrast of a given BufferedImage.
    ConvertToGrey
    ImageOperation to convert an image from colour to greyscale.
    EditActions
    Actions provided by the Edit menu.
    FileActions
    Actions provided by the File menu.
    FilterActions
    Actions provided by the Filter menu.
    FlipHorizontal
    ImageOperation to flip an image on its horizontal axis.
    FlipVertical
    ImageOperation to flip an image on its vertical axis.
    GuassianBlurModel
    Guassian blur class.
    GuassianFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Guassian Blur (simple blur) filter.
    ImageAction
    Abstract class representing actions the user might take in the interface.
    ImageOperation
    Interface for operations to be applied to images.
    ImagePanel
    UI display element for EditableImages.
    MeanFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Mean (simple blur) filter.
    MedianFilter
     
    Resize
    ImageOperation to resize an image.
    SharpenFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Sharpen (opposite of blur) filter.
    TransformActions
    Actions provided by the Transform menu.
    ViewActions
    Actions provided by the View menu.
